item.title: My journey as a participant with Recurse Center Part One of Two
item.description: Time really flies! It’s been six weeks since I’ve become a participant at the Recurse Center (RC). It’s an amazing space for new or experienced programmers, developers, or anyone who wants to spend time learning more about code. I’ve met so many motivated and talented individuals whom have inspired me to build more and code more frequently. I signed up to participate from February 15th to May 7th or the “Spring 1 2021 batch” as we call it.
